trans-unit.target: TEXT_REGSEAPVPSEASONREWARD_00341_SEASONREWARD_000_005<tab>Rewards for the “Feast” will be earned based on a participant's tier standing at the end of each season.

TEXT_REGSEAPVPSEASONREWARD_00341_SEASONREWARD_000_006<tab>Exclusive bonuses will also be awarded to the highest-ranked participants, so sharpen your blades, dust off your staves, and make ready for battle.

TEXT_REGSEAPVPSEASONREWARD_00341_SEASONREWARD_000_007<tab>Make the most of the current preseason period to hone your skills, and aim to claim the choicest prizes once the official first season begins!
TEXT_REGSEAPVPSEASONREWARD_00341_SEASONREWARD_000_008<tab>Season One is now underway! Rewards will become available once the season has ended.
TEXT_REGSEAPVPSEASONREWARD_00341_SYSTEM_000_009<tab>Season One rankings can be checked on the Lodestone.
